properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:51AM EST until January 22 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches.
Snow totals may exceed 5 inches in areas where the band of snow
remains persistent this afternoon and evening.

* WHERE...Southern Schoolcraft County.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...The snow will be wet and dense, making travel
hazardous, especially this afternoon into the overnight hours.
Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
